Room.Name: Plasnelt Park
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small park just south of Plasnelt Road.
Room.LongDescription: Trees and nicely trimmed bushes form a nice park where you may sit and contemplate your existance in this Land of Mordor. An old mage, white bearded and ugly, sits on a park bench, looking you over. He looks like he would like to talk, if you have the time. He wears a warm looking cloak, evidently stuffed with a great many things.
